title: RnGCam: High-speed video from rolling & global shutter measurements
summary: This paper proposes RnGCam, a system that fuses measurements from low-speed consumer-grade rolling-shutter and global-shutter sensors into video at kHz frame rates, enabling high-speed video reconstruction from compressive video capture.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the paper focuses on "high-speed video" and "fuses measurements... into video at kHz frame rates", which inherently involves both spatial and temporal dimensions, making it relevant to "Spatio Temporal".
